documents.document: @MrMalky Hmmm. No. not very catchy.
@PoliticsScot Year of the rooster after all!
@jjb362 How is this even happening? It's actually turning out to be worse than I imagined it would be...
I #ScrumTogether with @DoveMen to win #SCOvIRE RBS 6 Nations tickets. Pick your match by 8pm & you could too https://t.co/nZVQHmQS0r
@DrakiesPS Brilliant! I would also add "enterprising"! 😀
Deadline extended: great opportunity for someone in the Inverness area. Please share! https://t.co/t8vL2gHqd3
@gordonjbuchanan @BBC Really emotional. What a privilege to have witnessed this up close!
@alanferrier So it's the UK Idiots Party?! Ahhhh! Excellent! Explains a lot. 😂
@HumzaYousaf Make some time for a mince pie, Humza! Your job must be one of the toughest. And it's pretty thankless, so thank you.
@MrMalky Boak! First we have to endure snack-beard and now this.... 🙈
@GAPonsonby FORCE???! Gie's a break!
@splbanter Halitosis is rife!
@JamesMelville Absolutely priceless!
@Jim_Newlands It's lovely. I love the ref's reaction too!
@Adventure_Show @CameronMcNeish Fab article on the shielings. Want to go there. Def need to preserve these! Spine tingles. @welovehistory
@MissBabington OMG, that's just brilliant!
@JamieRoss7 check for mice?
@JamieRoss7 I had one in my room: my tights got chewed to bits and I slept in another room because of the noise! I survived. He didn't...
@thoughtland @GrayInGlasgow @NicolaSturgeon when the iron horses go under the sea and all that...
@HumzaYousaf @reformscotland Not a political football. Cross party cooperation urged on GMS this morn. Couldn't agree more.
@jjb362 I am astounded! 😂 You should be off playing piobaireachd with that time!
@jjb362 @Zaganashikwe IRONING??!!! A fitted sheet?! No, no, no, no, no! That goes against the entire raison d'être of a fitted sheet!!
@jjb362 I hate trying to fold them, but they are fab once on the bed! Mind you, even scrunched up they don't take up much room on a shelf! 😀
@drewhendrySNP Thanks for speedy response, Drew. I am looking forward to the much needed renovation and upgrade.
@drewhendrySNP I hear you, but what's happening with the improvements to Inverness station? Genuine query. Thanks.
@HumzaYousaf @BenMcFadden10 @MarkBarry67 @WingsScotland A new low there. What went through his mind when he posted that?
@duartlodge @BusyOaT @EuansCentre @SpeakUniqueVB absolutely wonderful idea.
Highland males needed. What an amazing initiative. https://t.co/V6Ga1ZvIhY
@ScotlandshireGB @gsoh31 Wow. So inspirational...
@PeteWishart apart from the 'wing' of their politics.
@JimSpenceSport Gordon made a good team selection. We've been playing well. England are slicker at the goal. We're heidless chickens...
@splbanter It's the Brexit effect. Sterling just keeps falling...
@JamesMelville @RollingStone But we all know what happens in D.C in January 2017... If 2016 was hellish, what on earth is in store?!
@weegingerdug Last night, I felt really positive & uplifted following your talk. Didn't last long.... 😕 Not your fault though! Thanks!
@Jahaangle @scottishlabour @kezdugdale @SkyMurnaghan Well said, Craig! Could not agree more.
@BBCQI stoor means dust, not stair. I also believe a stoorsooker is a Swedish term for a vacuum cleaner. Never heard a Scot say it. Ever.
#outlander: "The Wedding". Only episode hubby has ever seen. Told him it's not always like that and he just gave me a wry look! 😂😁
@katiec1314 I had no idea the world wars were about Scotland staying in the Union. Never picked up on that when studying my history degree..
@Jahaangle absolutely!
@Jahaangle and... You can't keep the pound. Lol! 😂
Thanks @DundeeRep and @EdenCourt for an absolutely fantastic night. #cheviot more relevant than ever! Amazing talent. Ceol agus craic!
@RuthDavidsonMSP and what did Theresa May do at your conference? I don't feel represented by her in the slightest. I don't want to leave EU.
@AngrySalmond Thank God for that! Bring it on, Nicola! Never mind the political benefits autonomy will bring!
#SCOLTU relieved we equalised there. Should have won. That bloody @skysports commentator still doing my head in.
#SCOLTU wonder how much cramp the Lithuanians will have noo that we've equalised?
@martin_compston @SNP_tweets don't tempt fate!!! Come on Scotland!
Open, liberal, brilliant inventors, but crap at football (at the mo!). Able to laugh at ourselves... or we'd greit. #WeAreScotland
@andrewgmorton WHAAAAAT??! Not sure whether to laugh or cry!
@MrJohnNicolson I'm clearly not very 'smart', as I have absolutely no idea what this is supposed to mean. Way too highbrow for me...
@weegingerdug nah, go for one that's a completely different colour. It'll look deliberate and confuse your guests!
@NeilDrysdale @HI_Voices what a cracker!
@splbanter Nut! I'm with you there, but man this sounds like a wee cracker, and I don't have BT Sport.... :'(
Man.... Don't have BT Sport and appear to be missing the match of the decade. Relying on social media. Come on @celticfc! #ChampionsLeague
@DrakiesPS @SocEntAcademy @RaigmorePS My pleasure! Great to meet such enthusiastic teachers! Hope to work with you all again soon!
@BBCScotland @PtmurtonG just watched this. Absolutely fantastic! The calves were amazing.
@GAPonsonby ...but just not in this country?
@Jahaangle I have found that since I stopped watching #bbcqt my blood pressure has lowered and my sleep pattern has improved. Better H&WB!
@NeilMackay Hadn't really been all that desperate to see Outlander. Until now... 😳
@jjb362 Fionn dearg gu brath!
@Fifegirl1953 @stefanhoggan Paul Noble is a Fifer, too. He's brilliantly commentating on swimming! He's also a successful former paralympian
@TheLastLeg #isitok to point out that after seeing the montage I noted that Alex is the only one of you who has not aged since London 2014?!
@Jahaangle Surprised we're not all flocking to Somalia for a better life.
@carolynleckie Another really thought provoking piece in the @ScotNational. Going to see the #cheviot next month. Tickets booked!
#MALSCO WTF???! 🙄 https://t.co/SMfgpyJPZu
#MALSCO Getting interesting. Bit harsh though, no?
@colinmccredie He is a half decent singer, too...
#MALSCO What the hell are we doing on that pitch? Don't know if I'm more angry with the players or the mince commentary.
@ScottishFA love that description! 😅
#MALSCO Braw! More of that please. Must have meant that! Goal of the century!
@CliGaidhlig an oidhche?! Caite bheil sibh?! ⛄️
@BBCScotWeather @BBCJohnBeattie but we've not even had Summer yet... 😬
@iainmacwhirter @heraldscotland Don't understand the obsession for remakes. Some originality please!
@dtaylor5633 @newsundayherald Yeah, that cycling guide looks awesome!
Very low flying helicopter at Canal at Muirtown, Inverness. 😞
Great opportunity for highland schools! https://t.co/WXMqPpQ6ov
Open to schools in the highlands. Great opportunity! https://t.co/WXMqPpQ6ov
@AlynSmithMEP I need an EU flag. What's the standard size on a flagpole? Can you bring me one home from Brussels?
Well I guess that was worth it! #keirin #bbcrio2016
#bbcrio2016 What's going on in this #keirin?! Totally nuts!
@clarebalding Who fires the gun? Or is it a sensor?
Just heard you discussing baking... @clarebalding ask @chrishoy about how much he likes eating stolen peanut butter cookies... 😉 #Rio2016
@JohnSwinney who ate all the pies?
@StuartWHOGG_ @TeamGB Don't be gutted. A silver is still good and #FIJ is a tiny wee island with very few resources. That was awesome!
Absolutely delighted for #FIJ #Rugby7s team. First ever #Olympics medal and it's gold. Wee tear in my eye!
#Rio2016 #Fiji #Rugby7s Come on Fiji! You are total legends! Get your gold!
@HumzaYousaf @BBCNewsnight I just despair that people feel it's acceptable to air such racist views. Humza's a brilliant MSP. Inspirational.
#bbcrio2016 #RugbySevens Thought it was Team 'GB'? Commentator just called rugby 7s 'England'. Happy to call them that when they lose.
@PhotoDM it looked exactly like that!
#bbcrio2016 #gymnastics Did someone just smear honey on their hands? Genuinely want to know if gymnasts do that! 😁
Congratulations to @danngoodfellow and @TomDaley1994 in the #diving! #Rio2016 Brilliant competition - loving it!
Oh man, those Chinese divers are absolutely out of this world! Incredible. #Rio2016 #diving Mind you, Tom and Dan just did well too!
@judmoo JUDY!! Concentrate on the skills!
@MichaelaTabb From a purely sporting perspective of course? 😊
If the divers are both so rubbish at the dive will their synchro mark make up for it?! #bbcrio2016 #diving
Wishing @TomDaley1994 all the best tonight. Hope the crowd gets bigger though! #RioOlympics2016
@niallbtwit Oh aye. She must be gutted. Especially with those negative comments about oil and small countries from Cameron and Osbourne...
@HumzaYousaf @ruth_wishart @PatrickPaul2015 @grimois I just despair that you have to read this utter tosh. Nothing but admiration for you.
BBC News - Premier Oil reports 'significant' North Sea find https://t.co/S3jqZgjNLq
@BBCjsutherland Very happy it's on earlier! Good news. ⚽️😊
@CameronMcNeish You're kidding?! I bought some Rioja to drink when watching The Western Way! Is this sacrilege?! 🍷
